title: Din Dong Specials
synopsis: Various animated shorts posted to Din Dong's official YouTube Channel. This entry is composed of: 《癲噹》片頭 @ 香港國際電影節 - 30 sec. - Feb 24, 2010 - an advertisement for the 34th Hong Kong International Film Festival 癲噹 x apm - 世界盃 - 45 sec. - Jun 10, 2010 - an advertisement for Palace APM cinemas stereoscopic 3D films for people who cannot use 3D glasses. 癲噹 x 姓旦老人 - 20 sec. - Dec 8, 2010 - Merry X'mas 大發現! 財神其實是"姓旦老人"? - 25 sec. - Jan 25, 2011 - Happy [Chinese] New Year 《癲噹》聖誕動畫 (⊙仚⊙) - 90 sec. - Nov 21, 2011 - Christmas animation NOTE FOR MODS: I tried to make this entry like https://myanimelist.net/anime/26017/Backkom_Specials for ease of database inclusion rather than making 5 separate entries. Also because the 1st ep of this technically aired 3 days before the 'main show'.
